verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician, <S%H5329><s%> Altaschith, <S%H516><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> or Song <S%H7892><s%> of Asaph. <S%H623><s%> To you, O God, <S%H430><s%> do we give thanks, <S%H3034><s%> to you do we give thanks: <S%H3034><s%> for that your name <S%H8034><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> your wondrous <S%H6381><s%> works declare. <S%H5608><s%>
When <S%H3588><s%> I shall receive <S%H3947><s%> the congregation <S%H4150><s%> I will judge <S%H8199><s%> uprightly. <S%H4339><s%>
The earth <S%H776><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> thereof are dissolved: <S%H4127><s%> I bear <S%H8505><s%> up the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of it. Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
I said <S%H559><s%> to the fools, <S%H1984><s%> Deal not foolishly: <S%H1984><s%> and to the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> Lift <S%H7311><s%> not up the horn: <S%H7161><s%>
Lift <S%H7311><s%> not up your horn <S%H7161><s%> on high: <S%H4791><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> not with a stiff <S%H6277><s%> neck. <S%H6677><s%>
For promotion <S%H7311><s%> comes neither <S%H3808><s%> from the east, <S%H4161><s%> nor from the west, <S%H4628><s%> nor from the south. <S%H4057><s%>
But God <S%H430><s%> is the judge: <S%H8199><s%> he puts <S%H8213><s%> down <S%H8213><s%> one, and sets <S%H7311><s%> up another. <S%H2088><s%>

For in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> there is a cup, <S%H3563><s%> and the wine <S%H3196><s%> is red; <S%H923><s%> it is full <S%H4392><s%> of mixture; <S%H4538><s%> and he pours <S%H5064><s%> out of the same: <S%H2088><s%> but the dregs <S%H8105><s%> thereof, all <S%H3605><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall wring <S%H4680><s%> them out, and drink <S%H8354><s%> them.
But I will declare <S%H5046><s%> for ever; <S%H5769><s%> I will sing praises to the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> also will I cut <S%H1438><s%> off; but the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be exalted. <S%H7311><s%>
